QuestData.Title: Have You Seen Anything Weird Out There?
QuestData.Description: $R! Listen up, I got somethin'... odd to discuss.$b$bI was out fishin' by Brightwater Lake when I saw the darnedest thing... some sorta wolf-man, running around Tirisfal. Ya don't suppose that could be a... worgen, do ya?$b$bAnyway, I keep tellin' myself I should tell Executor Zygand about it, but I just get so scared when I talk to that guy. Maybe you could talk with him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Executor Zygand about your encounter with the worgen.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... yes, that makes sense. Since the worgen have come streaming out of Gilneas, I knew it would only be a matter of time before they arrived here in Tirisfal.
